remarks: Proof by contradiction for a decidable proposition.  Based on Theorem *2.18 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 103 (also called the Law of Clavius). Intuitionistically it requires a decidability assumption, but compare with ~ pm2.01 which does not.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 24-Mar-2018.)
statement: pm2.18dc $p |- ( DECID ph -> ( ( -. ph -> ph ) -> ph ) ) $.
